title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Terrorist Infrastructure in Lebanon: A Detailed Report on the Attack and Response”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a terrorist infrastructure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization

A short while ago, several launches from Lebanese territory were identified toward the Mount Dov and Shomera area. IDF fighters attacked targets in Lebanon.

In the morning hours, a combat aircraft of the Air Force attacked a terrorist infrastructure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanese territory. In addition, a tank fired at a target to eliminate a threat posed from Lebanon.

Also, earlier this morning, a ground-to-air missile was launched from Lebanese territory at an Air Force aircraft operating in the area. The missile did not hit the aircraft which completed its mission successfully.

Attached is documentation of the attack on the terrorist infrastructure: https://bit.ly/4aNivR5
